title: WA BFF: Conversation State
notes: ConversationState DO (RPC-style, 10-turn cap, 30min pending TTL), reply classification (button + Indonesian free-text), message router (pending vs fresh), action execution via Service Binding, WA outbound client (Meta Graph API v21.0), outbound queue consumer with retry, status handler. 75 tests passing (45 new + 30 existing).
